amendment.description: An amendment numbered 75 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to clarify the funding prohibition of taxpayer dollars going to the Assad regime in the bill encompasses taxpayer dollars that are provided both directly and indirectly to the regime.
amendment.purpose: Amendment clarifies that no foreign assistance funds in the bill may be made available to areas of Syria controlled by Bashar al-Assad, both directly and indirectly.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson (SC) amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 257 - 154 (Roll no. 322).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wilson (SC) amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 257 - 154 (Roll no. 322).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
